name: Kraken's Cradle

desc.0: Most inspiration streaks by like a meteor, vanishing in a blink. Yet while modifying this W-Engine, a surge of powerful emotion sparked an idea that anchored itself in her mind, refusing to fade. Not a shackle, nor a consuming force, but something treasured — something she longed to keep safe. That became the source of this W-Engine's design.
desc.2: <ct color=#959595>"It's simply trying to guard the greatest treasure in this world, in the way it knows how." —She spoke softly, noticing the puzzled expressions on the Proxy siblings.</ct>

desc2: Equip to increase Rupture Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: In chasing illusions, she was entranced by the light that pierced through the mist.
